channel.title: 2013 on A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in 2013 on A Hugo website

item.title: Ontario Gas Units Generation vs Total - 2013
item.description: Year 2013 library(readxl) library(lubridate) library(dplyr) library(tidyr) Date Format G13<-read_excel("Output/GOC-2013.xlsx") G13$Date <- as.Date(G13$Date, format = "%Y-%m-%d") # Changing to Date format Total Generation Dz_13Total<-G13 %>% group_by(Date) %>% summarize(Total_2013_Gen=sum(TOTAL),n=n()) head(Dz_13Total) ## # A tibble: 6 x 3 ## Date Total_2013_Gen n ## <date> <dbl> <int> ## 1 2013-01-01 413181 24 ## 2 2013-01-02 473505 24 ## 3 2013-01-03 489156 24 ## 4 2013-01-04 465213 24 ## 5 2013-01-05 420954 24 ## 6 2013-01-06 419761 24 Goreway Power Station Dz_13Goreway<-G13 %>% group_by(Date) %>% summarize(Goreway_2013_Total=sum(`SITHE GOREWAY`),n=n()) head(Dz_13Goreway) ## # A tibble: 6 x 3 ## Date Goreway_2013_Total n ## <date> <dbl> <int> ## 1 2013-01-01 0 24 ## 2 2013-01-02 11716 24 ## 3 2013-01-03 14626 24 ## 4 2013-01-04 10032 24 ## 5 2013-01-05 4083 24 ## 6 2013-01-06 4760 24 Halton Hills Generating Station G13<-read_excel("Output/GOC-2013.

item.title: Ontario Gas Units Running Days - 2013
item.description: library(readxl) library(lubridate) library(plyr) library(dplyr) library(tidyr) Natural gas combine cycle plant generation depends upon market demand . Attemp has been made to calculate the number of days plant was supplying power to grid.It is a first attempt for a comparitive study with counting wind generating days G13<-read_excel("Output/GOC-2013.xlsx") ## Warning in read_fun(path = enc2native(normalizePath(path)), sheet_i = ## sheet, : Expecting logical in DL8767 / R8767C116: got 'pppp' ## New names: ## * `` -> .
